text: Richard Philip Lewis (June 29, 1947 - February 27, 2024) was an American comedian and actor. He was known for his roles as Marty Gold in Anything But Love and as himself in Curb Your Enthusiasm. Lewis was born in Brooklyn, New York. He was raised in Englewood, New Jersey. Lewis is Jewish.
